main event: A white rocket-shaped object was observed hovering in Orlando, Florida, on 18 December 1956.
interesting points: The object emitted fire from its tail as it hovered at a distance of a mile,The object climbed at an angle of 35 degrees above the horizon,The sighting lasted for one minute and thirty seconds,The conclusion of the report suggested the sighting could have been caused by an unidentified missile,There was another report regarding a flat round object observed on 6 December 1955 in Orlando.
